title: James Gibson Unloaded 25000 Shares of S & T Bancorp Inc (NASDAQ:STBA)
text:

Within the last 200 days, S&T Bancorp Inc’s price per stock has risen 29.53% and is in a strong and smooth up trend. Although S&T Bancorp Inc’s fundamentals are not so good and it’s stock has insider selling, we rate S&T Bancorp Inc, “NEUTRAL” because of our time-momentum model. Price Chart of S &Amp; T Bancorp NASDAQ:STBA Stock Source: RightEdgeSystems , Yahoo Split & Dividend Adjusted Data and OctaFinance Interpretations Hedge Funds Ownership 
Recently released 13F public filings show 120 institutional players have shares of S&T Bancorp Inc. The tracked institutional investors and hedge funds have traditionally had a high interest in S&T Bancorp Inc’s stock, and that was also the case in Q4 2014. The institutional ownership was 42.62% of the stock’s outstanding shares. They increased by 558,590 the total shares they hold. As of that quarter these professional stock owners owned 14.84 million shares. A total of 8 funds closed their positions in S&T Bancorp Inc and 33 reduced their holdings. There were 17 funds that created new positions and 40 funds that added to their positions. 
Three funds have the firm in their Top 10. They are: First Commonwealth Financial Corp Pa, S&T Bank Pa, Private Wealth Advisors Inc.. 
First Commonwealth Financial Corp Pa is the most positive institutional investor on S&T Bancorp Inc, with ownership of 125,298 shares as of Q4 2014 for 4.04% of the fund’s portfolio. S&T Bank Pa is another positive investment manager having 1.48 million shares of the company or 6.42% of their stocks portfolio. Private Wealth Advisors Inc. have 2.01% of their stock portfolio invested in the company for 139,833 shares. Moreover, The Pennsylvania-based fund Emerald Advisers Inc Pa revealed it had acquired a stake worth 0.39% of the fund’s stock portfolio in the company. The Maryland-based fund Burt Wealth Advisors was also a notable supporter of the public company, possessing 3,323 shares. S&T Bancorp Inc is less than 0.01% of the fund’s stock portfolio. S & T Bancorp NASDAQ:STBA Company Profile 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (S&T) is a bank holding company. The Company operates through its wholly owned subsidiaries, including   S&T operates   which   deposits,   services; Wealth Management, which offers   deeds, guardian and custodian of employee benefits and other trust and brokerage services, as well as a registered investment advisor that manages private investment accounts for individuals and institutions, and Insurance, includes an insurance agency offering commercial property and casualty insurance, group life and health coverage, employee benefit solutions and personal insurance lines. Company Website: S & T Bancorp 
S&T Bancorp Inc was incorporated in Pennsylvania on 1983-03-17. The company has 945 employees. As of writing its market value is: $1.06 billion and it has 34.72 million shares outstanding. Currently there are 46.19% shareholders and the institutional ownership is 46.19%. The stock closed at $30.530001 yesterday and it had average 2 days volume of 32506 shares. It is down from the 30 days average shares volume of 52924. S&T Bancorp Inc has a 52weeks low of $23.13 and a 52w high of $32.71. The stock price is above the 200 days Simple moving average. S&T Bancorp Inc last issued its quarterly earnings stats on 07/21/2015. The company reported 0.52 EPS for the quarter, above the consensus estimate of 0.49 by 0.03. The company had a revenue of 56.00 million for 3/31/2015 and 52.60 million for 12/31/2014. Therefore, the revenue was 3.40 million up.
